components.shortDesc: Create a PDF file using Text/Photo/ESignature
components.longDesc: Can be useful to integrate / add E-signature in any input form of web application. Ex. Resume builder, Dynamic PDF creation

components.shortDesc: This component provides reusable form components like input box, button etc
components.longDesc: This has different react reusable components created for creating a form.

This component provides list of images with scroll, initially the first image is selected and shown in larger box. When we click on larger image there is an image preview on full screen. We can click on images below and it will be selected and displayed in larger box. The selected image has border around it

components.shortDesc: This components converts speech to text using online API
components.longDesc: This app presents a UI with a mic icon to the user. On initial load, it populates all the data. When user clicks on mic icon and speaks something, speech to text transmission happens. The search string is displayed in read only text box. Then this search string is used to filter the data and presents it to the user. Whenever user clicks on mic symbol, the old search string gets removed and the app starts listening for the new search option. If the transcribed text does not match any record, a message is displayed. The search is happening across all the data fields. The app recognizes the spoken digits too.

components.shortDesc: This components converts speech to text without any online API
components.longDesc: The main moto of this app is it transmit speech to text recognition. As soon as the page loads we display all the data in the form of data table. So, based on the click of mic icon user would be able to provide input so as to filter the data. And this filter happens through out all the fields in the table and also recognizes the digits and clears the data when the mic icon is clicked back.

components.shortDesc: Ability to sign in the app
components.longDesc: This component provides the ability to add a signature pad within the React App

components.shortDesc: This component provides auto search with the help of an online API
components.longDesc: Instant Search app presents an auto suggest kind of component to the user where he/she types some alphabets as search string and the app hits an online API to come up with the suggestions. On initial load, we are showing all the data. When user selects an option out of the suggestions, the app shows the desired filtered data. User can select multiple options as well. We have given option to remove any of the search options as well.

components.shortDesc: This components uses Angular and .Net Core Backend service to send-receive push notifications
components.longDesc: Uses service worker Angular service and a .Net Core backend service to send-receive the push notifications. The notification channels are subscribed to from the front-end Angular application. The given channels are then broadcasted with required notifications (controlled via any user defined custom logic) from the backend .Net Core server.

components.shortDesc: This component provides us with reusable charts(Bar, line, donut, pie) created using D3 and capability to export to PDF
components.longDesc: Common chart components which are implemented using d3.js. This library provide Bar, Pie, Line and donut charts. This also extracts the chart in PDF format for sharing

components.shortDesc: Reusable Bar, Stacked Bar Charts created using D3 Library
components.longDesc: This component is created using D3 library. It helps the developer to create simple bar charts (vertical & Horizontal) and Stacked Bar charts. This library takes data in a specific format and displays the chart to the user

components.shortDesc: This components to export data displayed on a table to an excel keeping the formatting as is
components.longDesc: This is a javascript library which helps the user to export data displayed in a table to be exported and shared with other people. Unlike other libraries it tries to maintain the same styling, grouping and thus maintaining the usability aspect

components.shortDesc: Integrate google Map component and get all the map featues instantly
components.longDesc: This component utilises Google Maps API which can be used to get the location, routes, Point of Interest instantly without much to code

components.shortDesc: Component for quickly getting customer feedback
components.longDesc: This component will provide the developer with a feedback component which will have option to get teh feedback as well as to get the star ratings from the user

Validate a model is by using Data Annotations. It has a set of attributes and classes defined in the System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations assembly. Data Annotations allow us to decorate model classes with metadata. This metadata describes a set of rules that are used to validate a property.
